nodes.text: Nic Whoma was a male Gran gambler. He was present at the Outlander Club on Coruscant in 22 BBY when Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker entered chasing Zam Wesell.
Nic Whoma's costume was the same used for Mawhonic in The Phantom Menace.[source?]
The name "Nic Whoma" is an anagram of "Mawhonic".
